00059 class CalvinChpCheck : public RegressionCheck {

00072   CalvinChpCheck(std::vector<std::string> &generated, 
00073                  std::vector<std::string> &gold, 
00074                  int diffAllowed=0,
00075                  const std::wstring &prefix=L"apt-", 
00076                  double eps=0.0001) {
00077     m_Generated = generated;
00078     m_Gold = gold;
00079     m_EpsConfidence = eps;
00080     m_EpsQuantification = eps;
00082     m_EpsParam = eps;
00083     m_DiffAllowed = diffAllowed;
00084     m_Prefix = prefix;
00085 
00086     fillInToIgnore(m_IgnoreMap, prefix); // things know to change like user, time, etc.
00087 
00088     setMaxError(30);
00089   }
00090 
00096   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00097     bool success = true;
00098     if(m_Generated.size() != m_Gold.size()) {
00099       return checkMsg(false, "CalvinChpCheck::check() - generated and gold vectors must be same size.",msg);
00100     }
00101     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Generated.size(); i++) {
00102         try {
00103             m_Generated[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Generated[i].c_str());
00104             m_Gold[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Gold[i].c_str());
00105             CHPData chp1, chp2;
00106             CHPFileReader reader;
00107             reader.SetFilename(m_Generated[i]);
00108             reader.Read(chp1);
00109             reader.SetFilename(m_Gold[i]);
00110             reader.Read(chp2);
00111 
00112 
00113             string chp1Type = chp1.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId();
00114             string chp2Type = chp2.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId();
00115 
00116             success &= checkMsg(chp2Type == chp1Type, 
00117                                 "Error: Different CHP Types: " + chp2Type + ", " + chp1Type, msg);
00118 
00119             if(!headersSame(chp2, chp1, msg)) {
00120                 success = false;
00121             }
00122 
00123             if(chp1Type == CHP_MULTI_DATA_TYPE) {
00124                 CHPMultiDataData generatedChp, goldChp;
00125                 CHPMultiDataFileReader chpReader;
00126                 chpReader.SetFilename(m_Generated[i]);
00127                 chpReader.Read(generatedChp);
00128                 chpReader.SetFilename(m_Gold[i]);
00129                 chpReader.Read(goldChp);
00130                 if(!multiDataGenotypeSame(goldChp, generatedChp, msg, GenotypeMultiDataType)) {
00131                     success = false;
00132                 }
00133                 if(!multiDataExpressionSame(goldChp, generatedChp, msg, ExpressionMultiDataType)) {
00134                     success = false;
00135                 }
00136             } else if(chp1Type == "affymetrix-quantification-analysis") {
00137                 CHPQuantificationData generatedChp, goldChp;
00138                 CHPQuantificationFileReader chpReader;
00139                 chpReader.SetFilename(m_Generated[i]);
00140                 chpReader.Read(generatedChp);
00141                 chpReader.SetFilename(m_Gold[i]);
00142                 chpReader.Read(goldChp);
00143                 if(!quantificationDataSame(goldChp, generatedChp, msg)) {
00144                     success = false;
00145                 }
00146             } else if(chp1Type == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE) {
00147                 success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Unable to compare CHPs of type " + chp1Type, msg);
00148             } else if(chp1Type == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE) {
00149                 success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Unable to compare CHPs of type " + chp1Type, msg);
00150             } else if(chp1Type == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE) {
00151                 success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Unable to compare CHPs of type " + chp1Type, msg);
00152             } else {
00153                 success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Unable to compare CHPs of type " + chp1Type, msg);
00154             }
00155         } // end try
00156         catch(Except &e) {
00157             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00158         }
00159         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00160             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: AGCC library exception: " + 
00161                             StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()),msg);
00162         }
00163         catch(const std::exception &e) {
00164             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: standard exception: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00165         }
00166         catch(...) {
00167             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Uncaught Exception.",msg);
00168         }
00169     } // end for
00170     return success;
00171   }
00172 
00176   void clearHeaderIgnore() {
00177       m_IgnoreMap.clear();
00178   }
00179 
00184   void addHeaderIgnore(std::wstring &key) {
00185       m_IgnoreMap.insert(key);
00186   }

00190   // Header entries to ignore
00191   static void fillInToIgnore(std::set<std::wstring> &ignoreMap, const std::wstring &prefix) {
00192     ignoreMap.clear();
00193     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"exec-guid");
00194     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"analysis-guid");
00195     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"time-str"); 
00196     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"free-mem");    
00197     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"cvs-id");
00198     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"version");
00199     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"opt-block-size");
00200     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + L"opt-out-dir");
00201   }
00202 
00211   bool paramNamValTypeSame(ParameterNameValueType &gold, ParameterNameValueType &generated) {
00212     string goldName, genName, goldValue, genValue;
00213     /* For ease in debugger... */
00214     goldName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(gold.GetName());
00215     genName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(generated.GetName());
00216     goldValue = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(gold.ToString());
00217     genValue = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(generated.ToString());
00218     //    bool match = gold.GetName() == generated.GetName();
00219     bool match = true;
00220     if(gold.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType) {
00221       float goldFloat = gold.GetValueFloat();
00222       float genFloat = generated.GetValueFloat();
00223       double maxDiff = 0;
00224       checkFloat(goldFloat, genFloat, m_EpsParam, match, maxDiff);
00225     }
00226     // othewise compare as string.
00227     else {
00228       match &= gold.ToString() == generated.ToString();
00229     }
00230     return match;
00231   }
00232 
00239   bool paramVectorsSame(vector<ParameterNameValueType> &gold, vector<ParameterNameValueType> &generated) {
00240     bool match = true;
00241     if(gold.size() != generated.size())
00242       return false;
00243     for(int i = 0; i < gold.size(); i++) {
00244       match &= paramNamValTypeSame(gold[i], generated[i]);
00245     }
00246     return match;
00247   }
00248   
00249   
00250   bool ParameterNameValueTypeMostlySame(ParameterNameValueTypeVector &gold, ParameterNameValueTypeVector &test, 
00251                                         std::string &msg, std::wstring &prefix) {
00252     bool same = true;
00253     map<wstring,ParameterNameValueType> testMap;
00254     map<wstring,ParameterNameValueType>::iterator testMapIter;
00255     ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator goldIter; 
00256     ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator testIter;
00257     // Load up test as a map which will be queried by items in gold.
00258     for(testIter = test.begin(); testIter != test.end(); ++testIter) {
00259       testMap[testIter->GetName()] = *testIter;
00260     }
00261     for(goldIter = gold.begin(); goldIter != gold.end(); ++goldIter) {
00262       // ignore items that are in the ignoreMap
00263       if(m_IgnoreMap.find(goldIter->GetName()) == m_IgnoreMap.end()) {
00264         testMapIter = testMap.find(goldIter->GetName());
00265         if(testMapIter == testMap.end()) {
00266           msg += " Error: Test missing field: '" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(goldIter->GetName()) + "'";
00267           same = false;
00268         }
00269         else {
00270           string goldName, genName, goldValue, genValue;
00271           /* For ease in debugger... */
00272           goldName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(goldIter->GetName());
00273           genName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(testMapIter->second.GetName());
00274           goldValue = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(goldIter->ToString());
00275           genValue = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(testMapIter->second.ToString());
00276           if(!paramNamValTypeSame(testMapIter->second, *goldIter) &&
00277              Util::fileRoot(genValue) != Util::fileRoot(goldValue)) {
00278             msg += " Error: for field '" + goldName + "' expecting: '" + goldValue + 
00279               "' got: '" + genValue + "'";
00280             same = false;
00281           }
00282         }
00283       }
00284     }
00285     return same;
00286   }
00287 
00296   bool headersSame(CHPData &goldChp, CHPData &generatedChp, std::string &msgs) {
00297     bool success = true;
00298     FileHeader *goldHeader = NULL, *genHeader = NULL;
00299     goldHeader = goldChp.GetFileHeader();
00300     genHeader = generatedChp.GetFileHeader();
00301     /* Check the version. */
00302     success &= checkMsg(goldHeader->GetVersion() == genHeader->GetVersion(), "Error: different chp versions.", msgs);
00303 
00304     /* Check the group numbers. */
00305     success &= checkMsg(goldHeader->GetNumDataGroups() == genHeader->GetNumDataGroups(), 
00306                         "Error: Different group counts.", msgs);
00307 
00308     /* What type of array chp is from. */
00309     success &= checkMsg(goldChp.GetArrayType() == generatedChp.GetArrayType(), 
00310                         "Error: Different array types. [" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(goldChp.GetArrayType()) + " != " + 
00311                         StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(generatedChp.GetArrayType()) + "]", msgs);
00312     
00313     /* Algorithm used. */
00314     success &= checkMsg(goldChp.GetAlgName() == generatedChp.GetAlgName(), 
00315                         "Error: Different algorithm names.", msgs);
00316     
00317     /* Algorithm version. */
00318     success &= checkMsg(goldChp.GetAlgVersion() == generatedChp.GetAlgVersion(), 
00319                         "Error: Different algorithm names.", msgs);
00320     
00321     
00322     ParameterNameValueTypeVector goldList = goldChp.GetChipSums();
00323     ParameterNameValueTypeVector genList = generatedChp.GetChipSums();
00324     success &= ParameterNameValueTypeMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs, m_Prefix);
00325 
00326     goldList = goldChp.GetAlgParams();
00327     genList = generatedChp.GetAlgParams();
00328     success &= ParameterNameValueTypeMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs, m_Prefix);
00329     return success;
00330   }
00331 
00332 
00341   void checkMultiDataGenotypeEntry(ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &goldEntry, ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &generatedEntry, 
00342                          bool &localSuccess, double &maxDiff, int &numDiff) {
00343     if(goldEntry.name != generatedEntry.name) {
00344       localSuccess = false;
00345       reportError("Different names. gold: '" + goldEntry.name + "' test: '" + generatedEntry.name);
00346     }
00347     if(goldEntry.call != generatedEntry.call) {
00348       localSuccess = false;
00349       reportError("Different calls for snp: '" + goldEntry.name + "'. gold: '" + 
00350                   goldEntry.name + "' test: '" + generatedEntry.name + "'");
00351     }
00352     checkFloat(goldEntry.confidence, generatedEntry.confidence, m_EpsConfidence, localSuccess, maxDiff);
00353     if(!paramVectorsSame(goldEntry.metrics, generatedEntry.metrics)) {
00354       localSuccess = false;
00355       reportError("Param vectors different for snp: '" + goldEntry.name + "'.");
00356     }
00357     if(!localSuccess) {
00358       numDiff++;
00359     }
00360   }
00361 
00370   void checkMultiDataExpressionEntry(ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData &goldEntry, ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData &generatedEntry, 
00371                          bool &localSuccess, double &maxDiff, int &numDiff) {
00372     if(goldEntry.name != generatedEntry.name) {
00373       localSuccess = false;
00374       reportError("Different names. gold: '" + goldEntry.name + "' test: '" + generatedEntry.name + "'");
00375     }
00376     checkFloat(goldEntry.quantification, generatedEntry.quantification, m_EpsQuantification, localSuccess, maxDiff);
00377     if(!paramVectorsSame(goldEntry.metrics, generatedEntry.metrics)) {
00378       localSuccess = false;
00379       reportError("Param vectors different for probeset: '" + goldEntry.name + "'.");
00380     }
00381     if(!localSuccess) {
00382       numDiff++;
00383     }
00384   }
00385 
00394   void checkQuantificationEntry(ProbeSetQuantificationData &goldEntry, ProbeSetQuantificationData &generatedEntry, 
00395                          bool &localSuccess, double &maxDiff, int &numDiff) {
00396     if(goldEntry.name != generatedEntry.name) {
00397       localSuccess = false;
00398       reportError("Different names. gold: '" + goldEntry.name + "' test: '" + generatedEntry.name + "'");
00399     }
00400     if(goldEntry.id != generatedEntry.id) {
00401       localSuccess = false;
00402       reportError("Different ids. gold: '" + ToStr(goldEntry.id) + "' test: '" + ToStr(generatedEntry.id) + "'");
00403     }
00404     checkFloat(goldEntry.quantification, generatedEntry.quantification, m_EpsQuantification, localSuccess, maxDiff);
00405     if(!localSuccess) {
00406       numDiff++;
00407     }
00408   }
00409 
00418   bool multiDataGenotypeSame(CHPMultiDataData &goldChp, CHPMultiDataData &generatedChp, std::string &msgs, MultiDataType dataType) {
00419     bool success = true;
00420     double maxDiff = -1;
00421     int numDiff = 0;
00422     int numGenotyping = goldChp.GetEntryCount(dataType);
00423     int genNum = generatedChp.GetEntryCount(dataType);
00424     assert(dataType == GenotypeMultiDataType);
00425     Verbose::out(4, ToStr(numGenotyping) + " " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + " genotyping probesets.");
00426     if(!checkMsg(numGenotyping == genNum, "Wrong number of genotyping probesets.", msgs))
00427       return false;
00428     // if nothing to check, skip it.
00429     if(numGenotyping == 0)
00430       return true;
00431     for(int i = 0; i < numGenotyping; i++) {
00432       bool localSuccess = true;
00433       ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData goldEntry, generatedEntry;
00434       goldChp.GetGenotypeEntry(dataType, i, goldEntry);
00435       generatedChp.GetGenotypeEntry(dataType, i, generatedEntry);
00436       checkMultiDataGenotypeEntry(goldEntry, generatedEntry, localSuccess, maxDiff, numDiff);
00437       success &= localSuccess;
00438     }
00439     if(maxDiff > m_EpsConfidence)
00440       Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiff) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_EpsConfidence) + ") [confidence]");
00441     if(numDiff > 0)
00442       Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(numGenotyping) + " (" + 
00443                    ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/numGenotyping) + "%) were different.");
00444     if(!success && m_DiffAllowed >= numDiff) 
00445         success = true;
00446     if(!success) {
00447       msgs += "Error: " + generatedChp.GetFilename() + " is different from " + goldChp.GetFilename() + ". ";
00448     }
00449     std::string res = "different";
00450     if(success) 
00451         res = "equivalent";
00452     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": checked " + ToStr(numGenotyping) + " genotype entries.");
00453     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": max confidence diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiff));
00454     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00455     return success;
00456   }
00457   
00466   bool multiDataExpressionSame(CHPMultiDataData &goldChp, CHPMultiDataData &generatedChp, std::string &msgs, MultiDataType dataType) {
00467     bool success = true;
00468     double maxDiff = -1;
00469     int numDiff = 0;
00470     assert(dataType == ExpressionMultiDataType);
00471     int numExpr = goldChp.GetEntryCount(dataType);
00472     int genNum = generatedChp.GetEntryCount(dataType);
00473     Verbose::out(4, ToStr(numExpr) + " " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + " expression probesets.");
00474     if(!checkMsg(numExpr == genNum, "Wrong number of expression probesets.", msgs))
00475       return false;
00476     // if nothing to check, skip it.
00477     if(numExpr == 0)
00478       return true;
00479     for(int i = 0; i < numExpr; i++) {
00480       bool localSuccess = true;
00481       ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData goldEntry, generatedEntry;
00482       goldChp.GetExpressionEntry(dataType, i, goldEntry);
00483       generatedChp.GetExpressionEntry(dataType, i, generatedEntry);
00484       checkMultiDataExpressionEntry(goldEntry, generatedEntry, localSuccess, maxDiff, numDiff);
00485       success &= localSuccess;
00486     }
00487     if(maxDiff > m_EpsQuantification)
00488       Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiff) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_EpsQuantification) + ") [quantification]");
00489     if(numDiff > 0 )
00490       Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(numExpr) + " (" + 
00491                    ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/numExpr) + "%) were different.");
00492     if(!success) {
00493       msgs += "Error: " + generatedChp.GetFilename() + " is different from " + goldChp.GetFilename() + ". ";
00494       
00495     }
00496     std::string res = "different";
00497     if(success) 
00498         res = "equivalent";
00499     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": checked " + ToStr(numExpr) + " expression entries.");
00500     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": max signal diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiff));
00501     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(MultiDataDataSetNames[dataType]) + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00502     return success;
00503   }
00504 
00512   bool quantificationDataSame(CHPQuantificationData &goldChp, CHPQuantificationData &generatedChp, std::string &msgs) {
00513     bool success = true;
00514     double maxDiff = -1;
00515     int numDiff = 0;
00516     int numExpr = goldChp.GetEntryCount();
00517     int genNum = generatedChp.GetEntryCount();
00518     Verbose::out(4, ToStr(numExpr) + " expression probesets.");
00519     if(!checkMsg(numExpr == genNum, "Wrong number of expression probesets.", msgs))
00520       return false;
00521     // if nothing to check, skip it.
00522     if(numExpr == 0)
00523       return true;
00524     for(int i = 0; i < numExpr; i++) {
00525       bool localSuccess = true;
00526       ProbeSetQuantificationData goldEntry, generatedEntry;
00527       goldChp.GetQuantificationEntry(i, goldEntry);
00528       generatedChp.GetQuantificationEntry(i, generatedEntry);
00529       checkQuantificationEntry(goldEntry, generatedEntry, localSuccess, maxDiff, numDiff);
00530       success &= localSuccess;
00531     }
00532     if(maxDiff > m_EpsQuantification)
00533       Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiff) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_EpsQuantification) + ") [quantification]");
00534     if(numDiff > 0 )
00535       Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(numExpr) + " (" + 
00536                    ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/numExpr) + "%) were different.");
00537     if(!success) {
00538       msgs += "Error: " + generatedChp.GetFilename() + " is different from " + goldChp.GetFilename() + ". ";
00539       
00540     }
00541     std::string res = "different";
00542     if(success) 
00543         res = "equivalent";
00544     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": checked " + ToStr(numExpr) + " quantification entries.");
00545     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": max signal diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiff));
00546     Verbose::out(1, generatedChp.GetFilename() + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00547     return success;
00548   }

00551   std::vector<std::string> m_Gold;
00553   std::vector<std::string> m_Generated;
00555   double m_EpsConfidence;
00556   double m_EpsQuantification;
00557   double m_EpsParam;
00559   int m_DiffAllowed;
00561   std::wstring m_Prefix;
00563   std::set<std::wstring> m_IgnoreMap;
